text: (tavada) “mage deviyane! niyata vasayenma oba ma hata ek rajyayakda, laba di (dayava pahala kara) sihinayange arthayanda ma hata uganva dunneya. ahasda, bhumiyada utpadanaya kala tænættani! melovadida, paralovadida mava araksa karannada obaya. sampurnayenma (obava) anugamanaya karanneku vasayenma mava oba atpat kara ganu mænava! honda vahalunge samuhayehida mava oba ekkasu kara harinu mænava!” (yayi prarthana kaleya)
